accessibility_text:
[Home](./)[Things to Do](things_to_do/index.php)Manassas Museum 

# Manassas Museum

  * Explore new spaces, shop in Echoes, the Manassas Museum store, and see our new exhibits!
  * Manassas Museum hours are Tuesday-Saturday 10 a.m.-5 p.m., Sunday 12 p.m.-5 p.m. 
    * The Museum is closed on Mondays, Labor Day through Memorial Day, but open on Monday Federal holidays.
    * Manassas Museum is closed on the following days: New Year's Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve, and Christmas Day.

### [Museum Programs & Exhibitions ](things_to_do/manassas_museum/events.php)

Enjoy exhibits, book talks, family programs, tours, and more. Visit [YouTube](http://youtube.com/manassascityva) and [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/cityofmanassasleisure) for a library of virtual programs and tours.

### [K-12 Educational Programs ](things_to_do/manassas_museum/k-12_education_programs.php) All K-12 Education Programs at the Manassas Museum can be customized to meet the unique needs of your school, classroom, and students. 

### [Explore Historic Sites ](things_to_do/manassas_museum/historic_sites/index.php)

The Manassas Museum stewards historic sites that are important not only for their contribution to local history, but for their role in our nation's history. [Take a virtual historic site tour.](https://experience.arcgis.com/experience/0b06e63620364ae7987e47501eae17f0/page/English-Version/?data_id=dataSource_2-Manassas_Historical_Sites_742%3A4&views=Standard-View%2CSite-List-View%2CStandard-M...
